author: Marc Berman
title: Julius Randle not listening to trade ‘gossip’ as low value likely keeps him Knick

sentence: Team president Leon Rose, executive vice president William Wesley and general manager Scott Perry have not spoken publicly since the start of training camp, but the remodeling of the roster in the summer has not worked as expected.
author: Steve Popper
title: Julius Randle and the Knicks: What's next?

author: Steve Popper
title: Knicks lose to Lakers in overtime after taking 21-point lead
